message.raw:
Added optional argument open_state to instatiation of Shutter, which changes the
instructions issued by open and close functions (i.e. shutter closed/open can
now correspond to a DigitalOut being high/low). Also moved allowed_states
attribute inside __init__ of Shutter as it is dynamic.

message:
Added optional argument open_state to instatiation of Shutter, which changes the
instructions issued by open and close functions (i.e. shutter closed/open can
now correspond to a DigitalOut being high/low). Also moved allowed_states
attribute inside __init__ of Shutter as it is dynamic.
